suggestions.title: Immediate Hydration Required: Offer Full Glass Now
suggestions.description: User 1106: At 3:44 PM, the elderly person has consumed less than 55ml (26.25% of a 200ml glass) along with only 6ml from food, totaling just 61ml of water today, which is dangerously low for a person aged 77+. RIGHT NOW, offer and encourage them to drink a full 200ml glass of water. If they have swallowing difficulties, provide water in small, frequent sips using a straw or cup with handles. Monitor them closely as they drink to ensure safe consumption.
